fields.fieldText: Select a shipping address to reship items to.

fields.fieldText: Select the items to reship.

fields.name: TXT_10_02
fields.fieldText:
Inventory issue


This Flow will now stop : no reservations were saved in OCI, no Fulfillment Order was created.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Invocable_Action_Message
textTemplates.text: Close this window and check the order summary page for updated information.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_noDeliveryGroupsToReship
textTemplates.text: ﻿When an order has items you can reship, you can find them here.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_noDeliveryGroupsToReship_Header
textTemplates.text: Nothing to Reship

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Unmanaged_Order
textTemplates.text: You can only run this flow on a managed order summary.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Unmanaged_Order_Title
textTemplates.text: The specified order summary is unmanaged.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Wrong_Entity
textTemplates.text: This is where you'd cancel items from an order. To cancel an order, start from the order summary page.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Wrong_Entity_Header
textTemplates.text: We don't think you meant to come here.

textTemplates.name: Fulfillment_Order_Creation_Error_Message
textTemplates.text: The system encountered an error while creating fulfillment orders.

textTemplates.name: Fulfillment_Order_Creation_Error_Title
textTemplates.text: Fulfillment Orders creation is unsuccessful.

textTemplates.name: Location_Empty_Message
textTemplates.text: You can only run this flow for the orgs with locations available.

textTemplates.name: Location_Empty_Title
textTemplates.text: Locations are not available for this org.

textTemplates.name: Location_Groups_Empty_Message
textTemplates.text: You can only run this flow for the orgs with location groups available.

textTemplates.name: Location_Groups_Empty_Title
textTemplates.text: Location Groups are not available for this org.
